name: endless-dimensions
description: A Minecraft mod that replicates 20w14infinite snapshot mechanics using Moud

scripts.dev: npm run build:ts && node run-moud.js dev
scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:extensions && moud pack && node post-build.js
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && node -e "const { IntegrationTesting } = require('./dist/testing/IntegrationTesting'); const test = new IntegrationTesting(); test.initialize().then(() => test.runAllTests()).then(reports => console.log('Test Results:', reports)).catch(err => console.error('Test Error:', err));"

author: EndlessDimensions
